FIELD.NAME: CONTENT-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message content description

FIELD.NAME: MSG-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Echo of the MSG-ID field from the Request message

FIELD.NAME: RESPONSE-STATUS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the status of the Archive retrieval message Request being processed

FIELD.NAME: TIME-COMPLETED
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time application completed processing the request

FIELD.NAME: RETURN-VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Return value or status based on the RESPONSE-STATUS. Used to indicate product URI as requestor or responder. Also can be used to provide function call status or error code in the case of failed completion

FIELD.NAME: PROD-NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the product being returned

FIELD.NAME: PROD-DESCRIPTION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Description of the product in text or xml

FIELD.NAME: PROD-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Product type and subtype being requested. (See Table 4-29. Product Categories)

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-PROD-SUBTYPES
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of further delineations / categories beyond the product subtype. Also, used as msg subject elements ME5, ME6, etc. in Product Message. In the range 0+.

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-START
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the start of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: PROD-SUBTYPE.n.NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: First subcategory of the product subtype. (Subject elements ME5, ME6, etc. of the Product Message)

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-END
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the end of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: URI
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: URI specifying the location where the file product is stored

FIELD.NAME: NAME-PATTERN
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Describes the name of the file

FIELD.NAME: DESCRIPTION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Description of the file contents in text or xml

FIELD.NAME: FORMAT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Describes the file format of the file

FIELD.NAME: VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the version of the file
